alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 03 at 3:31AM CST until February 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...In Minnesota, North Cass, South Cass and Crow Wing Counties. In Wisconsin, Bayfield, Ashland, Iron, Sawyer and Price Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Lac Courte Oreilles Reservation, the Bad River Reservation and the Red Cliff Band. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; South Cass
